ai-atk-s0305a1:178_1: You should frequently reflect on the perception of death, saying: “My perception of death is very harmful, I am bound up with death.”
ai-atk-s0305a1:178_2: As to repulsiveness in food, etc., that is, the perception of repulsiveness in nutriment, etc., that is,
ai-atk-s0305a1:178_3: discontent with the whole world, having arisen in the whole world, will give rise to perceptions of discontent.
ai-atk-s0305a1:178_4: Two perceptions of giving up and perceptions of fading away.
ai-atk-s0305a1:178_6: That is how the perception of bones is developed and cultivated by twenty-two meditation subjects.

ai-atk-s0305a1:178_8: But this is the exposition concerning the paths to purification in this way.
ai-atk-s0305a1:178_9: The Linked Discourses on the Ganges should be understood as stated in the way already described.
